sqlMap.statement:
SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO", PrptyGroupName AS "PRPTYGROUPNAME", PrptyGroupDesc AS "PRPTYGROUPDESC" FROM (
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PrptyGroupName) AS ROWNO, PrptyGroupName, PrptyGroupDesc FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM02
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE '%' || #searchPrptyGroupName# || '%'
) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS "TOTALCOUNT" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM02
UPPER(PrptyGroupName) LIKE '%' || #searchPrptyGroupName# || '%'
